definition: in arrears/behind in payments/to default on one's debts
to owe a debt/the sum owed
to fall short of/to have a deficit/deficit/deficiency
all we need is an east wind (idiom); lacking only one tiny crucial item
to offer credit/credit transaction/to buy or sell on account
to half rise out of one's chair (a polite gesture)

sentences.english: Thanks so much. I owe you one.
sentences.chinese: 真谢谢你，我欠你一份情。

sentences.english: Bias affects the overshoot or undershoot of the motion through the keyframe.
sentences.chinese: 偏见影响过头或欠该议案通过关键帧。
许愿就是债，欠了不容赖。

sentences.english: Scald struggle traditional premium rubber tire less easily than sulfur or sulfur phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 传统电烫斗补胎容易造成橡胶欠硫或过硫的现象。

sentences.english: My debts were like a millstone round my neck.
sentences.chinese: 我欠的债象是在脖子上套着个磨盘。

sentences.english: I know I owe you a lot of money, but can I borrow a little more?
sentences.chinese: 我知道我已经欠你很多钱了，但是我能再借一些么？

sentences.english: God knows I owed it to them.
sentences.chinese: 上帝知道我欠他们这个。

sentences.english: How much do you owe, Mickie?
Because before Wang Lan owes the white dragon favor, she promised to come down.
sentences.chinese: 因为之前汪兰欠着白龙人情，她只好答应下来。

sentences.english: But now, that risk's gone away and a mountain of government borrowing has taken its place.
sentences.chinese: 然而现在，危机虽然已经过去，政府却欠了一屁股债。

sentences.english: She had to sign an indenture to sell herself, because she owed money to the landlord .
sentences.chinese: 由于欠地主家的钱，她不得已签了卖身契。

sentences.english: Songs of Digging Pool played an important role in development of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 《圭塘矣欠乃集》在棹歌发展史占有重要地位。

sentences.english: Start by figuring out exactly how much you owe, and decide what you're going to tackle first.
sentences.chinese: 先算清自己到底欠了多少债，然后想办法去解决。

sentences.english: Bring forward a algorithm to estimate DOA under the spatial sub-Nyqusit sampling.
sentences.chinese: 提出了空域欠采样条件下的到达角估计的算法。

definition: to owe a debt/the sum owed
